item.title: Blocked Drain, 18th December
item.description:
Drain at the bottom of my drive at Martellen Stockwell Lane Woodmancote Cheltenham is blocked causing the road to flood as shown in the picture. The metal grating is 9 inches below the level of the road causing a hazard to traffic when unseen due to concealment by the water. This has been reported to you before with no action taken.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Beverley Gardens, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very rough part of the lane because of all the potholes., 18th December
item.description:
There is a few metres of Dark Lane, just below the garage of Shepton Cottage that is full of potholes and broken off tarmac. It is extremely rough to drive on but so bad whilst riding my horse and pushing my baby in his pram. Maybe the holes could be filled but what would be even better would be if the few metres of lane could be resurfaced. Thank you for your time. Fay
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dark Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There are lots of large and deep potholes down this part of the lane. We down here everyday and we also walk a lot with a pram and it is very difficult with all the potholes., 18th December
item.description:
The potholes are located his below Barbara Cottage. If these could be filled this would be amazing please. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dog Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked and water is coming out of it a running tight down the lane like a river., 18th December
item.description:
The drain just up from Barbara Cottage is blocked. I’ve tried too but it’s blocked inside. Water is coming out of it and running down the lane like a river. We had the same problem last year with this drain and it ripped up all the tarmac on the lane when it became frosty. Please can the drain be unblocked so water can run down that instead of the lane. Thank you

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dog Lane, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
